title: Bernie Sanders Won the Debate, and Perhaps the Election, When He Defended Hillary Clinton
text: It was, without question, the climax of the debate. Hillary Clinton was defending herself against email allegations, when Bernie Sanders came to her rescue. In doing so, he not only demonstrated the decency that is the hallmark of his
